committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the second full calendar week in March 1977 as "National Employ the Older Worker Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the second full calendar week in March of 1977 as "National Employ the Older Worker Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the second full calendar week in March 1977 as "National Employ the Older Worker Day".
